TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1486
TEI.2.document_title: Alexander Hodge to Stephen F. Austin, 11-01-1826

barker_notes.barker_summary: Alexander Hodge to Austin, November 1, 1826. Application for land.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1486

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Alexander Hodge to Austin, November 1, 1826. Application for land.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*District of Victoria*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="11-01-1826">1st of Nov. 1826*/date_mentioned*.*/p* *p*Dr sir.*/p*
*p*I arrived in this *location_mentioned*Colony */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="12-xx-1825">last December*/date_mentioned* and have failed to make application for *location_mentioned*Land */location_mentioned*yet expecting to have met with you in this *location_mentioned*section */location_mentioned*before now I have my *person_mentioned*family */person_mentioned*all with me and have to settle for life I wish to procure *location_mentioned*Land in the lower section of Country */location_mentioned*I have four *person_mentioned*sons */person_mentioned*Two married and two single all of age who also wishes to procure *location_mentioned*Land */location_mentioned*Be so good as to write me where it is probable I shall get *location_mentioned*Land */location_mentioned*and how and when etc*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*ALEXANDER HODGE*/person_mentioned**/p* *p*N B you will please enter my name on your list as applying for *location_mentioned*Land */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="12-xx-1826">last December*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p* *person_mentioned*A.H.*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
